page.name: Lumps of Coal Shop
page.description: <no description available>

page.name: Blade of Delight
page.description: This sword's mirror-bright blade is sure to delight Frostval celebrants old and young. Another reason to celebrate:  It has a chance to heal  5% of your life on a successful hit.

properties.name: Blade of Delight
properties.description: This sword's mirror-bright blade is sure to delight Frostval celebrants old and young. Another reason to celebrate:  It has a chance to heal  5% of your life on a successful hit.

page.name: Blade of Rejoicing
page.description: It is truly a time to rejoice, for your friends have been freed from Noxus cruel, coal-loving grasp.  Carry this sword as a reminder of your victory and enjoy its healing powers: a 5% chance to heal you on a successful hit.

properties.name: Blade of Rejoicing
properties.description: It is truly a time to rejoice, for your friends have been freed from Noxus cruel, coal-loving grasp.  Carry this sword as a reminder of your victory and enjoy its healing powers: a 5% chance to heal you on a successful hit.

page.name: Blade of Festivity
page.description: Festivities are in full swing all over Frostvale as the towns inhabitants celebrate your victory over Noxus and enjoy freedom from a carbon-bound existence.  Moglin magic has imbued this sword with healing magic- a 5% chance to heal you!

properties.name: Blade of Festivity
properties.description: Festivities are in full swing all over Frostvale as the towns inhabitants celebrate your victory over Noxus and enjoy freedom from a carbon-bound existence.  Moglin magic has imbued this sword with healing magic- a 5% chance to heal you!

page.name: Blade of Revelry
page.description: Noxus turned your friends to coal. Then you triumphed, made them whole. Let the celebrations begin.  It's always better when the good guys win. Falalalala lalalala.  Moglin magic gives this sword a chance to heal you 5% on a successful hit!

properties.name: Blade of Revelry
properties.description: Noxus turned your friends to coal. Then you triumphed, made them whole. Let the celebrations begin.  It's always better when the good guys win. Falalalala lalalala.  Moglin magic gives this sword a chance to heal you 5% on a successful hit!

page.name: Blade of Wonder
page.description: This Blade of Wonder/ has an edge of light. / A sword of healing/ shining bright...  Feel free to sing along as you carry this year's Frostval reward into battle in the coming months.  It has a chance to heal  5% of your life on a successful hit.

page.name: Blade of Amusement
page.description: This weapon is a fitting reminder of all the amusement that comes when you have fun and enjoy the little things.  It has a chance to heal  5% of your life on a successful hit.

properties.name: Blade of Amusement
properties.description: This weapon is a fitting reminder of all the amusement that comes when you have fun and enjoy the little things.  It has a chance to heal  5% of your life on a successful hit.

page.name: Blade of Kindness
page.description: The Frostval season should be a reminder to everyone to be kind to everyone, even those that may not necessarily always deserve it. It has a chance to heal  5% of your life on a successful hit.

properties.name: Blade of Kindness

page.name: Blade of Forgiveness
page.description: Forgiveness is a trait every hero should have no matter how dark the day is. Sometimes those that do the most wrong were themselves wronged the most. Never forget that. It has a chance to heal 5% of your life on a successful hit.
